author: NTrevisani
body:
#### PR description:

This plugin will be used to include in nanoAOD the relevant pieces of information needed to compute final state recovery, as currently implemented in the H->mumu analysis.
A pull request has been opened also on the dedicated cms-nanoAOD repository. In order to check the code formatting and quality, the c++ part of the pull request is additionaly presented on the cms-sw repository.

#### PR validation:

The plugin has been tested on nanoAOD production, together with related changes in the configuration files.
title: plugin for muon FSR recovery
